data.name: Super Rich
data.detailed_description:
This is a funny casual game, just opening it on your desktop then you will get many many bills fall from the sky! Fulfill your wish to get rich in seconds! Support many editing options

Main features

  • Interactive simulation - react to the mouse movement
  • Many editing options - you can change almost every effect.
  • Game Mode - will pause when you need 100% power for your games.
  • Optimization - reduced equipment requirements. Optimized code created for mobile devices.
  • Multi-Language
data.about_the_game:
This is a funny casual game, just opening it on your desktop then you will get many many bills fall from the sky! Fulfill your wish to get rich in seconds! Support many editing options

data.short_description: Want to be super rich? just use it on your desktop now, fulfill your wish to get rich in seconds!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 / 8.1 / 8 / 7
  • Processor: Intel i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD Graphics 4000 or above
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel i7 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660, AMD HD7870, 2 GB VRAM or above
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
